actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2412 of title 28, United States Code, to provide in a condemnation proceeding the discretionary award of fees and expenses of attorneys to the condemned.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of reasonable fees in real property condemnation proceedings by the United States for property for use by its agencies and departments. (Adds 28 U.S.C. 2412(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2412 of title 28, United States Code, to provide in a condemnation proceeding the discretionary award of fees and expenses of attorneys to the condemned.
